ActorTalk: Ribbit! Now we just need to sprinkle these dewdrops on the soil where the three-leaf clover seed is buried. Once it's soaked up enough pure emotion, it'll grow into a Miracle Clover!
Froggie's gonna sprinkle the Wish Dewdrops now, ribbit!
W-why... why isn't anything happening, ribbit?

So, in the original story, Froggie actually fails to grow the Miracle Clover?
